VP Area Academic Affairs Department 00723 - Virginia Tanner Creative Dance Location Campus City Salt Lake City, UT Type of Recruitment External Posting Pay Rate Range 42000 to 47000 Close Date Open Until Filled No Job Summary This is primarily a teaching position. The Dance Specialist teaches dance classes to students ranging in age from two to adults. The Dance Specialist is able to teach in all of Tanners Programs including: Arts in Education, Studio classes in creative and modern dance, Ballet, Jazz and Hip-Hop, Adaptive Needs Dance, and Adult Dancers with Disabilities in both the LEADD and Elevate programs. The Dance Specialist assists the Director of Tanner Dance, the Program Manager or Program Directors with specific programs, projects and administrative duties. Responsibilities Teaches dance classes to students ranging in age from two to eighteen years old. Assists the Director with artistic and administrative duties. Presents lecture demonstrations and school in-service. Tours with the dance company throughout Utah and the United States. Minimum Qualifications Bachelors degree in dance or equivalency (one year of education can be substituted for two years of related work experience); training in the Tanner method of dance instruction; four years of professional performance experience in a company, including choreography, or equivalency required. Demonstrated communication skills; the ability to interact with/and teach children; and a commitment to provide excellent customer service required. Preferences The Dance Specialist is expected to teach upwards of 20 hours a week. They will assist the Director of Tanner Dance, the Program Manager, or Program Directors and administer projects and programs. Assists in rehearsals and performances. Attends weekly staff and faculty meetings.
